The net present value of the benefits to the forest sector ranges from $10.7 billion to $15.9 billion (1980 USD), depending on the GCM and economic scenario. This result reflects the positive economic impact of climate change adaptation within the forest sector. The SD is undefined but a range is known. The 'Value' is the mean of the range.
